Content.Question: What can I do with this app?
Content.Answer: The purpose of this application is to allow both researchers and the general public to better understand the trends of and predict the shifts in Covid-19 variants. We aim to provide users with rankings for and patterns within region-specific variants. In addition, we plan to use a Machine Learning model to predict Covid variants.

Content.Question: Who made this app?
Content.Answer: A team of seven Georgia Tech students, in cooperation with KPMG, who want to provide accesible and useful variant data regarding Covid-19.

Content.Question: How do I contact the team?
Content.Answer: To contact our team, please go to the contact page and fill it out with your information. We will get back to you as soon as possible!

Content.Question: Where do these variants come from?
Content.Answer: All of these variants are retrieved from the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI) database.

Content.Question: Where can I find more details about a specific variant?
Content.Answer: To find more details on a variant click on the hyperlinked variant, this will bring you to the NCBI details on that strand. Here you will find both the FASTA download for the sequence and its ID.

Content.Question: How do I compare a variant against another variant?
Content.Answer: By clicking on the 'See More' option for a given region, you will be taken to a screen where you can select variants to compare, click the COPY button to copy them to the clipboard, and click COMPARE to be taken to BLAST where you can compare them.

Content.Question: How do I look at the information about a region?
Content.Answer: By clicking the SELECT VARIANTS button at the top of the screen, you can look through the list of countries to find the one you want. You can also type the name of the country into the search bar.

Content.Question: Why separate variants based off region?
Content.Answer: Separating by region allows you to look at the developments of variants within a select area. As mutations may be influenced by the diversity of individuals within a region, as seen in areas of high travel, as more variants are introduced into the pool of competition.

Content.Question: Is my data secure?
Content.Answer: Yes! We are using industry standard protocol and practices to ensure that your account and data is safe.

Content.Question: I'm running into an error, what should I do?
Content.Answer: If you have an error please contact our team on the contact page, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
